section.title: ML2 Extension Manager
section.paragraph: The extension manager for ML2 was introduced in Juno (more details can be found in the approved spec). The features allows for extending ML2 resources without actually having to introduce cross cutting concerns to ML2. The mechanism has been applied for a number of use cases, and extensions that currently use this frameworks are available under ml2/extensions.
